statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.REG_ID DESC) AS ROW_NO , AA.REG_ID , AA.PRODUCT_ID , AA.MATERIAL_ID , BB.PRODUCT_NAME AS MATERIAL_NAME , AA.INPUT_QTY , M1.NAME AS UNIT_TYPE , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
FROM UCD.PRODUCT_MATERIALS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS BB ON AA.MATERIAL_ID = BB.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON BB.UNIT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#

SELECT AA.REG_ID , AA.PRODUCT_ID , AA.MATERIAL_ID , BB.PRODUCT_NAME AS MATERIAL_NAME , AA.INPUT_QTY , BB.UNIT_TYPE
, dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
FROM UCD.PRODUCT_MATERIALS AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS BB ON AA.MATERIAL_ID = BB.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.REG_ID = #REG_ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UCD.PRODUCT_MATERIALS ( PRODUCT_ID, MATERIAL_ID, INPUT_QTY, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #PRODUCT_ID#, #MATERIAL_ID#, #INPUT_QTY#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS REG_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UCD.PRODUCT_MATERIALS SET PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID# , MATERIAL_ID = #MATERIAL_ID# , INPUT_QTY = #INPUT_QTY# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE REG_ID = #REG_ID#
